code: import React from"react";import{Carousel,Image}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import isNumberDecimal from"../../utils/isNumberDecimal";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCarousel(_ref){let{latestProducts=[]}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center main-carousel-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{pause:"hover",className:"text-center main-carousel",children:latestProducts.map(product=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"pt-1",children:product.brand}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{style:{fontSize:"1rem"},children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-carousel-img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{className:"main-carousel-img",src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"pt-2",children:["CHF"," ",isNumberDecimal(Number(product.price))]})]})},product.id);})})});}export default ProductCarousel;
